replication-data-complete: Updating indexes... it could be delayed a moment.
replication-complete: Đồng bộ hoàn tất thành công.
replication-started: Syncronization has begun, waiting for response...
menu-import-configuration-error-known: Could not import configuration because of an error
menu-visualization-fullscreen: Chuyển sang màn hình đầy đủ
menu-visualization-devtools: Công cụ cho nhà phát triển
menu-downgrade-beta: Go back to latest stable version...
menu-no-updates-available: Mapeo is all up to date! You're using the latest version.
menu-status-incomplete: The database is missing some entries
save-db-dialog: Create a new database to syncronize
welcome-screen-2-title: Mapeo is an offline map editor.
welcome-screen-2-text-1: Mapeo makes it easy for individuals or teams to create maps and organize stories and knowledge.
welcome-screen-2-text-2: Mapeo has been built in collaboration with indigenous communities in the Amazon.
welcome-screen-2-text-3: The data you create is stored privately on your computer. You can share it with other Mapeo users via a sync file, or export it to GeoJSON.
welcome-screen-2-text-4: This is a preview of Mapeo, it is in continued development and we are building an accompanying mobile app. Sign up on our website to receive notifications when new versions are released.
welcome-screen-2-text-5: We welcome your feedback and reporting of bugs, please get in touch through our GitHub repository.
welcome-screen-3-example-dataset: Load an example OpenStreetMap dataset from Arapaho National Forest in Colorado
convert-number: You have filtered your data to show {count} observations
convert-detail: {count} of these are not yet in Map Editor. Click OK to move these {count} observations to Map Editor.
convert-nothing: These are all already in the Map Editor.
